name: Arkham Advertiser: 'Sailors Vanish from Docks' [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A clipped article from the local paper, slightly yellowed.
content_summary: Reports on the third disappearance of a dockworker in as many months. Police Chief Chadwick dismisses the events as 'unrelated incidents' and warns against 'idle speculation', but locals whisper of 'things' that crawl out of the Miskatonic River at high tide.
